page.title: 07Shopping in Culcheth
page.content: Most of the shops in Culcheth are along Lodge Drive and Common Lane,the biggest shop is C.P.S.(Culcheth Provision Store.)It started in Leigh as N.C.P.S.(Nelsons Central Provision Stores)then moved to Culcheth. Above the store is a Shopping Mall of about 21 shops and a cafe.There are 2 other supermarkets in the village, Gateways,which used to be Lennons,and Hanburys.There are also a few shops on Warrington Rd,2 Newsagents,1 Estate Agent,1 photo shop,1 furniture shop and a sports shop which is soon closing down.There is a choice of shopping for food in Culcheth,you can buy fresh food from the Bakery,the Greengrocery and the Butchers shop, there is also a man selling Fleetwood Fresh Fish who comes in his van on Tuesdays and Thursdays.The other choice is to buy frozen food.
